system.description: Beginning at 8th level, whenever you deal damage with a whip, flail, scythe, or a spell that deals necrotic damage, you may choose to regain a number of hit points equal to your wisdom modifier. If you are already at maximum hit points, you instead gain temporary hit points. Once you have used this feature to heal or gain temporary hit points a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.
